message: Let's be practical, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats away at your share!
Alice, let's be fair. I'm offering a larger share recognizing the impact of inflation on my end. This offer benefits us both.
Bob, inflation is hurting you more than me. Accept this generous offer before it's too late!
Alice, this is my final offer. I understand the impact of inflation, but I also value fairness. Let's end this here.
